high_level_goal: Rework entire website color scheme with new primary and background colors

inputs.description: Update the entire site color scheme. Replace the current purple gradient theme with a clean navy + white scheme.

NEW_COLOR_SCHEME.primary_description: Dark navy blue - use for headers, buttons, accents, nav
NEW_COLOR_SCHEME.background_description: White - use for page backgrounds, cards, negative space

subtasks.title: Update CSS variables / base colors
subtasks.details: Find all instances of the old purple gradient (#667eea, #764ba2) and replace with the new primary #1A2744. Create CSS custom properties at the top of styles.css for easy theming: --primary: #1A2744; --background: #FFFFFF;

subtasks.title: Update buttons
subtasks.details: Replace gradient buttons with solid #1A2744 background. Hover state can be slightly lighter or use opacity. Secondary buttons: white background with #1A2744 border and text.

subtasks.title: Update navbar
subtasks.details: Keep white/light navbar background. Update active link color and underline to #1A2744. Logo text color to #1A2744.

subtasks.title: Update hero section
subtasks.details: Keep the background image overlay but adjust overlay color if needed. Ensure CTA button uses new primary. Metric highlights can use a gold/amber accent (#D4A84B or similar) for contrast against navy.

subtasks.title: Update section backgrounds
subtasks.details: Alternate between #FFFFFF and a very light gray (#F8F9FA or #F5F6F8) for section contrast. KPIs/pricing sections that were purple gradient should now use #1A2744 solid or a subtle navy gradient.

subtasks.title: Update icons and accents
subtasks.details: Tech icons, step icons, feature icons should use #1A2744 instead of purple/green gradients. Can keep gold (#D4A84B) as accent color for highlights.

subtasks.title: Update footer
subtasks.details: Footer background to #1A2744 (dark navy). Text white/light for contrast.

subtasks.title: Update info/ pages
subtasks.details: Apply same color scheme to all info/*.html pages. Hero sections on sub-pages should use #1A2744 instead of varied gradients.

subtasks.title: Ensure readability
subtasks.details: Check all text contrast ratios. Dark text on white backgrounds, white text on navy backgrounds. Links should be clearly visible.

deliverables: Updated styles.css with new color scheme
CSS custom properties for easy theming
All pages using consistent navy (#1A2744) + white (#FFFFFF) scheme
